product.name: C Shaped End Table, Side Tables Couch TV Tray Table, Small Snack Sofa Table with Metal Frame for Living Room, Bedroom, Bedside for Small Spaces, Rustic Brown Black
product.description:
Artigarden C side end table is designed to slide easily under a sofa or chair, allowing the table to be positioned close to you for convenient use.
It is a multifunctional table suitable for different spaces, a laptop table for study room, a couch table for living room, a bedside table for bedroom, etc.
The small side table meets all your expections for small spaces!
Beside desk, laptop table, sofa side table, under couch table, chairside table, coffee snack table, TV tray for eating etc.
product.bullet_points:
• C-Shape Design: This couch tray table offers the perfect space-saving solution for small apartments or homes. This heavy-duty tall slim sofa side table sized at 16.9" D x 13" W x 24.5" H easily fits the gaps between your couches or the tight spots beside your bed, taking up minimal floor space and freeing up valuable real estate in your room. 16.9" wider desktop for better storage!
• Adjustable Feet: The foot pads of this portable sofa side desk can be easily adjusted to fit the height of your sofa or couch's armrest, providing a comfortable surface for your drinks and snacks. Additionally, the foot pads are designed to protect your floors from scratches and scuffs, ensuring that your space stays looking its best.
• Multi-Functional Use: This versatile modern furniture piece can be used as an end table, a chair side table or even as a bedside table. It provides the perfect surface for placing books, glasses, drinks, snacks, magazines, laptop, remote controls or electronic devices within easy reach when lounging on your couch or relaxing in bed.
• Sturdy Construction: This portable laptop table for couch is constructed with a solid metal frame that provides excellent stability and support. It is further reinforced with triangular metal pieces for added strength, making it highly durable and reliable. It can hold up to 30 pounds of weight with ease and withstand daily use for years to come.
• Easy to Assemble: This skinny sidekick end table comes with all the necessary hardware and easy-to-follow instructions, making it a breeze to install. You'll have it set up in minutes without any special tools or expertise required. You can start enjoying your new tv trays for eating on couch right away!
• Stylish and Practical: With its simple yet elegant design, this c side table will complement any decor style. Whether you have a traditional or modern living room, this table adds a touch of sophistication to your space while providing extra functionality.
